title: Jewish Soviet Communism - Liberty Hour - American Free Press
description:
THE LIBERTY HOUR

Hosts Mark Glenn and James Morris

February 14, 2009

Guest: Masha Vallenchenko

MP3 audio file runs 1 hr 28 mins, is 5.2 mb in size.

Masha Vallenchenko is an attorney involved in human rights issues in Russia, previously having worked in the human rights legal department directly under President Putin's administration. Over the past few years she has been embarked on research of the greatest violation of human rights and life in the history of the world... that is the 1917 Revolution in Russia and its tragic consequences for so many Russians. 

Excerpt:

"Jews blamed their own misfortunes on these agitations that they called "pogroms" but actually in reality those pogroms was just Russians' attempt to defend themselves from Jewish economic exploitation..."

"...The reasons for progroms was purely economic and not ethnic."

- Vallenchenko

TalmudTimmy: Some twit (Stephen Sneigoski) takes over the show at about the 50 minute mark and starts blabbing on about how Stalin actually turned against the Jewish Soviets. Keep your ears open and take everything with a grain of salt. A great show though nonetheless. Sneigosky to me sounds like a shill. He just sounds Jewish.
